EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Top Data Science Trends for 2015_Q414.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Top Data Science Trends for 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
With 2015 just around the corner, the Pivotal Data Science team has been challenged to point its predictive inclinations toward spotting emerging trends in Data Science. With a global team of 30, doing innovative work in almost every vertical market, Pivotalâ€™s data scientists have a rich view into the underlying trends and shifts impacting their craft.
Join Pivotal <http://www.pivotal.io/agile/top-data-science-trends-for-2015-webinar> on December 16 to learn about the top predictions for Data Science in 2015. Leaders from the team will share their insights on the key Data Science industry trends for the coming year, and attendees will have an opportunity to share their own thoughts and predictions.
REGISTER NOW >> <http://www.pivotal.io/agile/top-data-science-trends-for-2015-webinar> TOP DATA SCIENCE TRENDS FOR 2015 TUESDAY DECEMBER 16, 2014 10AM PST REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/agile/top-data-science-trends-for-2015-webinar>
